definitions: A short pin or bolt, typically tapered at one end, that is used for securing something in place, hanging things on, or marking a position.
A pin or bolt driven into the ground to hold one of the ropes or corners of a tent in position.
A bung for stoppering a cask.
A point or limit on a scale, especially of exchange rates.
A place marked by a peg and allotted to a competitor to fish or shoot from.
